import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../conponents/Rating' import axios from 'axios' // import products from '../products' const ProductScreen=({match})=> { // const product=products.find((p)=>p._id===match.params.id) const [product, setProduct]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchProducts= async () =>{ const {data} = await axios.get('api/products'); //backend theke data ene frontend e ana hoise setProduct(data); } fetchProducts() }, []) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ? 'In Stock':'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen;
